message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe has the potential to be incredibly valuable to your business.  I'm confident that you'll find it to be a game-changer. I'm asking for $1500000 for it. This is a price that reflects the true value of the product, but I'm willing to negotiate if you have concerns. If you're interested, I'd be happy to schedule a time to discuss it in more detail.
